summary: The SkyFoundry Act of 2025 mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish and manage a program focusing on the rapid development, testing, and mass production of small unmanned aircraft systems. This program, administered through the Secretary of the Army, will utilize alternative acquisition methods, including leveraging existing facilities for both innovation and production. The Act also addresses intellectual property rights, employs the Defense Production Act, and allows for expedited approvals and waivers to accelerate the process. The program aims to bolster domestic industrial capacity in this field.
